TypeSignature.Value: .class public sequential ansi sealed beforefieldinit CONTEXTMENUITEM extends System.ValueType

summary.span: 为 方法定义新的菜单项、子菜单或插入点。

span.span: Defines a new menu item, submenu, or insertion point for the method.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 构建根目录快捷方式菜单开始。Building the shortcut menu starts at the root. 每个新项将在其中插入项的子菜单或插入点的末尾。Each new item goes at the end of the submenu or insertion point where you insert the item. 有关使用 CONTEXTMENUITEM 结构和 Microsoft 管理控制台 (MMC) 的编程的详细信息，请参阅[MMC 程序员指南](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/windows/desktop/mmc/mmc-programmer-s-guide-overview)。For more information about programming with the CONTEXTMENUITEM structure and the Microsoft Management Console (MMC), see the [MMC Programmer's Guide](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/windows/desktop/mmc/mmc-programmer-s-guide-overview).
